name: Epiplahobia - Finger Runner (+ Virtomae Arcade Edition)
name_original: Epiplahobia - Finger Runner (+ Virtomae Arcade Edition)
description:
Run as fast as you can from a haunted dresser without looking back in this retro-style first-person endless runner from the creator of Virtomae. Gain cash to use and fun points in the pet simulator, when playing the Windows version!

Controls: 
Mouse and mouse buttons / Z, X / touch - click repeatedly

Twitter (Contact): @virtomae
